item.title: List available templates
item.description: Rnssp R Markdown templates are being designed and released on a regular basis. All available templates can be explored on the publicly accessible Rnssp RMD templates Github repository. Luckily, the Rnssp R package provides various utility functions to easily manage templates. One of those utility functions is the Rnssp::list_templates() function. First, load the Rnssp R package: # Load the Rnssp package library(Rnssp) then, get the most recent list of the available packages:
